fdd:FDD.titleName: Profile 0 for JPEG 2000, Part 1, Core Coding

fdd:identificationAndDescription.fdd:fullName: ISO/IEC 15444-1:2000. Information technology -- JPEG 2000 image coding system -- Part 1: Core coding system, Amendment 1, Codestream Restrictions (2002), Profile 0 (formal name); JPEG 2000 Profile 0 (common name)

fdd:description.p: Implementation of JPEG 2000 Core Coding (Part 1) that constrains the use of variables in the specification ("restricts the codestream") to serve low-complexity applications, e.g., cell phones and other mobile devices. One key restriction limits image tiles to 128 pixels in each dimension; another limit (shared with profile 1) requires that the low resolution element in the image (LLD; the "D" is a subscript) also be 128 pixels in each dimension, facilitating the rapid construction of a thumbnail by most decompressors.
Additional general information about JPEG 2000 profiles is provided in J2K_C Notes.
